mapper.select: SELECT MT1.CATEGORY_NAME, (CASE WHEN MT2.AMOUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MT2.AMOUNT END) AMOUNT, (CASE WHEN MT2.RATIO IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MT2.RATIO END) RATIO FROM (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = #{income_and_expenses}) MT1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT T1.CATEGORY, SUM(T1.AMOUNT) AMOUNT, ROUND(SUM(T1.AMOUNT)/MAX(T2.TOTAL_AMT) * 100, 2) RATIO FROM LEDGER T1, (SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) TOTAL_AMT FROM LEDGER WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = #{income_and_expenses} AND DATE BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}) T2 WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND T1.INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = #{income_and_expenses} AND DATE BETWEEN '${date}-01' AND LAST_DAY('${date}-01') GROUP BY CATEGORY) MT2 ON MT1.CATEGORY_NAME = MT2.CATEGORY;

SELECT SUM(IF(MONTH = '01', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '1', SUM(IF(MONTH = '02', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '2', SUM(IF(MONTH = '03', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '3', SUM(IF(MONTH = '04', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '4', SUM(IF(MONTH = '05', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '5', SUM(IF(MONTH = '06', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '6', SUM(IF(MONTH = '07', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '7', SUM(IF(MONTH = '08', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '8', SUM(IF(MONTH = '09', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '9', SUM(IF(MONTH = '10', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '10', SUM(IF(MONTH = '11', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '11', SUM(IF(MONTH = '12', TOTAL_AMOUNT, 0)) AS '12', SUM(TOTAL_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_YEARLY FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE, "%m") AS MONTH, SUM(AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM LEDGER WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = #{income_and_expenses} AND DATE BETWEEN '${date}-01-01' AND '${date}-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATE, "%m")) AS SUB_TABLE;
